events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn’t been delivered. The tracking info hasn’t updated for several days either.
The customer's issue was categorized under Delivery Delay due to delayed shipping and tracking concerns.
Assigned delivery support agent to handle the delayed shipment inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear your order has not arrived yet. Let me help you with this.
Could you please provide me with your order number so I can check the shipping status for you?
Sure, the order number is 789456123. I’m really hoping it arrives soon as I need it for a special occasion.
Thank you for the info. I see the package is delayed at a distribution center. We expect delivery within 3 more days.
I’m disappointed the delay is this long. I wish there was a faster way to get my order.
Escalated the case to the logistics team to see if expedited shipping options are available.
The logistics team confirmed they have prioritized your shipment and it should arrive within 24 hours now.
Thank you for the update and quick action. I appreciate your help in speeding up the delivery.
We consider the delivery delay issue resolved with the priority shipping intervention now in place.
Checking in to confirm your package has arrived and everything is in order.
Since your shipment arrived successfully, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience.
